t: Amazon Live Chat — Announcement and Breakdown
s: December 15, 2023 - One of Amazon’s strongest benefits is its commitment to improving the seller experience in their marketplace. To help brands sell more and solve problems faster than ever, Amazon has introduced live chatting with Selling Partner Support directly through Seller Central.
